name: Amazing Tinge
description:
HOW TO PLAY:

  • Using W-A-S-D to move the main character around the map.
  • Press Esc Button to pause the game.
  • There are some diamonds with color resources that player need to collect.
  • When collecting enough color resources, you can unlock the door and come to get the final award.
  • You will win when touching the final reward.

CREDITS:

  • Minh Son Tran   - 101137552
